description: This Creamy Vegetarian Pasta recipe is perfect for weekly dinners. It takes less than 30 minutes to get this tasty meal on your plate, and it's made from only a handful of simple ingredients.
keywords: Creamy Vegetarian Pasta, vegetarian pasta recipe
name: Creamy Vegetarian Pasta
recipeIngredient: 1 package cream cheese with garlic and herbs

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente.
In large skillet, over medium-high heat, add onion and pepper. Cook—stirring occasionally—for 3 to 4 minutes or until softened. Remove from heat.
In the saucepan, add cream cheese and 1/2 cup reserved pasta cooking water. Mix to coat the pasta. (If necessary, add more pasta water to obtain a creamier sauce.) Add vegetables and mix.
Divide the pasta into bowls and serve.
